question: Show directors and producers who have won Oscar.
sql_query1:
SELECT Production.FullName
FROM Production
WHERE (Production.Film_Profession = "Director" OR Production.Film_Profession = "Producer") AND Production.Award = "Oscar"
sql_query2:
SELECT Production.FullName
FROM Production
WHERE Production.Film_Profession = "Director" OR Production.Film_Profession = "Producer" AND Production.Award = "Oscar"
interpretation1: Which directors have won an Oscar award and which producers have won the same award?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all directors and also provide a list of producers who have won an Oscar award.
